author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Banca Sistema Issues 2018-2020 Strategic Plan
text:
April 11 (Reuters) - BANCA SISTEMA SPA:
* SAID ON TUESDAY THAT THE BOARD HAD APPROVED THE STRATEGIC PLAN TO 2020
* SEES FACTORING TURNOVER IN 2020 AT EUR 3.3 BLN * TARGETS CET1 RATIO OF ABOUT 10.5 PCT OVER THE PLANâ€™S PERIOD AND ABOVE 11 PCT BY 2020
* TARGETS ADJUSTED INTEREST INCOME MARGIN OF 400-450 BASIS POINTS IN 2018-2020
